column5: Displays the status of your working directory. Options include new, staged, and modified files. It will retrieve branch name, current commit identifier, and changes pending commit.
Add a file to the staging area. Use. in place of the full file path to add all changed files from the current directory down into the directory tree.
Show changes between working directory and staging area.
Shows any changes between the staging area and the repository.
Discard changes in working directory. This operation is unrecoverable.
Revert some paths in the index (or the whole index) to their state in HEAD.
Create a new commit from changes added to the staging area. The commit must have a message!
